doc.field: - TCBY Enterprises Inc said its board has approved a three-for-two split of its common stock with a distribution to be made on April 24 to stockholders of record on April 9. The split will increase the number of outstanding shares to over 26 mln from about 17.3 mln shares now, the company said. TCBY Enetrprises is a franchisor and operator of retail stores specializing in frozen yogurt-related treats.
